byline.contributor: Eric Schmitt contributed reporting from Doha, Qatar, and Gardiner Harris from Washington.

abstract: United States airstrike in Raqqa, Syria, kills Islamic State operatives Salah Gourmat and Sammy Djedou, who were involved in 2015 Paris bombings, and Walid Hamman, who was convicted in absentia for thwarted terrorist attack in Belgium.

headline.print_headline: 3 Operatives From ISIS Are Killed in U.S. Strike
headline.main: 3 ISIS Terrorism Planners Killed in Syria Airstrike, Pentagon Says

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The three men were killed on Dec. 4 in an airstrike in Raqqa, Syria, the Islamic State’s declared capital, a Pentagon spokesman said....
lead_paragraph: The three men were killed on Dec. 4 in an airstrike in Raqqa, Syria, the Islamic State’s declared capital, a Pentagon spokesman said.
